description: The US president acknowledges the Israeli attack, which he described as 'successful,' but remains committed to a negotiated solution, reflecting how deeply averse his political base is to being dragged into a new war abroad.

Donald Trump's long-standing obsession with military parades
description: More than 6,000 soldiers are set to march in Washington on Saturday to mark the 250th anniversary of the United States Armed Forces. In 2017, the US president was impressed by the July 14 Bastille Day parade on the Champs-Elysées in Paris, to which President Macron had invited him.

headline: In Ukraine, the Dnipropetrovsk region faces threats of a Russian breakthrough toward Pokrovsk
description: Moscow, which has aimed to seize the strategic city in the Donetsk region, says it has crossed the administrative border. A claim Kyiv denies.

headline: 'Can robots beat the wolves of Wall Street?'
description: According to a study conducted by Stanford University, artificial intelligence has outperformed 93% of US equity mutual fund managers. So it is hardly surprising that the asset management industry is doubling down on technology, observes Le Monde columnist Isabelle Chaperon.

headline: Thomas Piketty: 'Opponents of the tax on the ultra-wealthy lack historical perspective'
description: After France's Sénat voted against a 2% wealth tax for people whose worth exceeds €100 million, the economist argues that the scale of France's debt and funding needs for social and climate challenges will soon require even more radical redistributive measures.

Two Jewish sisters' fight to honor the couple who hid them during the Holocaust
description: Arlette and Madeleine Testyler campaigned so that Jeanne and Jean Philippeau, who sheltered them during World War II, be recognized as Righteous Among the Nations. After some hesitation from the mayor, the town of Vendôme is organizing a ceremony on June 16 in which they will be honored by the Yad Vashem Institute.

headline: Paris exhibition tries to answer the mystery of Cleopatra
description: Blending archaeological artifacts, pop culture imagery, and paintings, an exhibition on Cleopatra explores how the Egyptian queen has been depicted and perceived through the centuries.

headline: War in Ukraine: Russia steps up its offensive in the Donetsk region
description: Seizing complete control of the region − nearly one-third of which remains under Ukrainian control − has been a primary goal for the Kremlin. The arrival of summer has made it easier for Russian forces to advance.
